summary: My own version of Gandalf is now a standalone Follower
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b] [center]  GANDALF FOLLOWER 2016

[size=3]Gandalf is now a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.

Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Fire Balls Staff and Silver Sword.
Location : Temple on Kynareth, Whiterun
Combat Style : Mage combat
[size=2][size=3]..and is unkillable
[size=5][b][size=3][size=4][color=#93c47d]18/09/2016 UPDATE 1.1 IS HERE!!![/color]
[color=#93c47d](New style with white robes and a new white Staff)[/color]
[size=3][Credit]
[size=2][size=3]
